General.info: Get info about the bot and prefix.
General.userinfo: Get the info about user's profile
General.accage: Get the age of user's account
General.cmdperm: See which commands you can use
General.perm: See which permissions the user has in the server
General.claimtime: Configure claim time after giveaway end
General.welcomer: Setup the welcomer (only without embed working till now)
General.leaver: Setup the leave message (only without embed working till now)
General.statusrole: Make the bot automatically remove or add role by checking text in status or bio
General.dmall: Dm All The Users In The Server.

Moderation.ban: Ban a user from the server.
Moderation.unban: Unban a user from the server.
Moderation.kick: Kick a user from the server.
Moderation.purge: Delete the amount of messages given by the user
Moderation.resetwarns: Remove all warnings of a user
Moderation.checkwarns: See how many warns a user have
Moderation.lock: lock the channel so users can't chat there
Moderation.unlock: unlock the channel so users can chat there
Moderation.hide: hide the channel so users can't see that channel
Moderation.unhide: unhide the channel so users can see that channel
Moderation.role: Add or remove a role from the user

Invites.invites: See the invites of a user.
Invites.invited: Check the list of users the user has invited.
Invites.whoinvited: See who has invited the user.
Invites.resetinvites: Reset the invites of a user.
